text: Fenway Sports Group, LLC (FSG), is an American sports company which owns several professional sports teams. These include the Boston Red Sox, a Major League Baseball team; the Liverpool Football Club, a Premier League team; and the Pittsburgh Penguins, a National Hockey League team. == History == FSG was originally called New England Sports Ventures. It was created in 2001, after John W. Henry, Tom Werner, Les Otten, the New York Times Company, and other investors came together and successfully bid for the Red Sox. In March of 2011, the company changed its name to Fenway Sports Group. Category:2001 establishments in England Category:Companies based in Massachusetts Category:Sports in Boston
title: Fenway Sports Group
